job_history.work_description: Contracted as accountant for client during a maternity leave. Bookkeeping for clients and personal taxes. Assessed and advised client on internal controls, audit follow up to ensured policy and procedure compliance and effectiveness.

Lead a team of direct report quality assurance specialists and inspectors. Build Effective relationships with customers, vendors and plant employees. Manage product inspections to identify and isolate quality issues.
Responsible for month end closing process for three plants. Cash management. Management of all AP and AR functions. Supervision of AP/AR clerks.
General ledger: BS accounts, fixed assets, inter-company accounts. Sales and use tax for multiple states. Prepared/implemented procurement card policy and procedure.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in various accounting roles, including staff accountant, senior staff accountant, and contract accountant, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Handled cash management, AP, and AR functions in multiple roles, suggesting strong proficiency in financial management.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll in a staff accountant role, showing a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Internal Controls
skills.explanation: Assessed and advised on internal controls as a contract accountant, indicating a solid working proficiency in internal controls.

skills.name: Audit and Compliance
skills.explanation: Followed up on audit findings and ensured policy and procedure compliance as a contract accountant, showing a solid working proficiency in audit and compliance.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Led a team of quality assurance specialists and inspectors as a quality manager, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Quality Management
skills.explanation: Managed product inspections and identified quality issues as a quality manager, showing a solid working proficiency in quality management.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: No direct mention of Microsoft Excel in the work descriptions, but likely used in various accounting roles.
